SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class ActionTextSystem

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.ActionTextSystem
public class ActionTextSystem extends Object
Class to put moving text on the screen to report actions. Implements the singleton pattern.
Author:
Franck Limtung (flimtung)
